title: AquaTrans AT600 - Accuracy
subtitle: Flow Transmitter
details: ±1% to ±2% Reading Accuracy, Clamp-on ultrasonic measurement, Ideal for Oil & Gas water systems

title: DigitalFlow XGF868i
subtitle: Non-intrusive Design
details: Supports HART and Modbus, Velocity, Volumetric, and Totalized Output, Extremely easy setup

title: TransPort PT878GC

details: Works on wide pipe range, Supports lined and unlined pipes, Durable for industrial environments
